{"id": "2529", 
"title": "Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)", 
"description": "Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now select both P1 and P2. Notice that the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project item is not.", 
"OB": "The Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project item is not.", 
"EB": "Both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should either be available or neither should be enabled.", 
"SR": ""}
